Ongoing quiz management

Andreas Handel

2021-04-20

Source: vignettes/F_quiz_administration.Rmd
F_quiz_administration.Rmd

Overview

This describes ongoing administration of the class list and quizzes while the course is running.

Updating materials

If you need to make updates to either the main gradelist.xlsx file or the complete quizzes on the server, proceed as follows:

  1. Make any modifications to the quizzes you need to make. Generate and distribute updated student versions.

  2. During a time when students won’t submit anything (e.g. right after a submission deadline or Saturday morning at 6am), download materials from the server.

  3. FIND A WAY TO UPDATE GRADELIST.

CONTINUE HERE AND MAKE SURE THE ONLINE SUBMISSION SYSTEM WORKS
